channel.title: Internet Explorer and Firefox
channel.description:
my website: http://www.greenacreglobalpartners.co.uk
renders perfectly in Firefox, but look at it in internet explorer, do you have any ideas why it is doing this?
thanks in advance

item.title: Internet Explorer and Firefox
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

fixed it now, back to original error.
looks bad in ie

item.title: Internet Explorer and Firefox
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[code]

Green Acre Global Partners Ltd 
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.3.2/jquery.min.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://www.greenacreglobalpartners.co.uk/assets/js/main.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://www.greenacreglobalpartners.co.uk/assets/js/investments.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://www.greenacreglobalpartners.co.uk/assets/js/login.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://www.greenacreglobalpartners.co.uk/assets/js/color.jq.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://www.greenacreglobalpartners.co.uk/assets/js/users.js"></script>

<script type="text/javascript">

		var SITE_ROOT = 'http://www.greenacreglobalpartners.co.uk/';
</script>
</head>
<body>
    <div id="centerme">
    <div id="container">
    	<div id="translate" align="center">
            <a href="javascript:translatePage('en');document.location = location.href;">English </a>  |
            <a href="javascript:translatePage('ar');document.location = location.href;">العربية Arabic </a> | 
            <a href="javascript:translatePage('el');document.location = location.href;">Ελληνικά Greek </a> | 
            <a href="javascript:translatePage('zh-CN');document.location = location.href;">官話 Chinese </a> |  
            <a href="javascript:translatePage('es');document.location = location.href;">Español Spanish </a> |  
            <a href="javascript:translatePage('ru');document.location = location.href;">Русский язык Russian </a> |  
            <a href="javascript:translatePage('fr');document.location = location.href;">Français French </a> |  
            <a href="javascript:translatePage('hi');document.location = location.href;">हिन्दी Hindi </a> |  
            <a href="javascript:translatePage('sv');document.location = location.href;">Svenska Swedish </a> |  
            <a href="javascript:translatePage('ms');document.location = location.href;">Bahasa Melayu Malay </a>

        </div>
    <div id="header">
	</div>
    <div id="navigation-left"><img style="float:right; margin:0px;" src="http://www.greenacreglobalpartners.co.uk/assets/images/menu-right.png" />
        <div id="navigation">
            <div align="center">
            <a href="http://www.greenacreglobalpartners.co.uk/">Home</a><!--
            --><a href="http://www.greenacreglobalpartners.co.uk/index.php?/about">About</a><!--
            --><a href="http://www.greenacreglobalpartners.co.uk/index.php?/info">Investments</a><!--
            --><a href="http://www.greenacreglobalpartners.co.uk/index.php?/login">Members</a><!--
            --><a href="http://www.greenacreglobalpartners.co.uk/index.php?/contact">Contact</a><!--
            --></div>

        </div> 
    </div>
    <div id="content">		<br />

[/code]
Is being echo’d twice, I know that much. Isn’t doing well in either browsers.

Read full topic
